title: Chickpea, Artichoke, and Feta Salad
directions: Combine chickpeas, artichokes, celery, feta cheese, parsley, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, mint, oregano, and thyme together in a bowl; toss to coat completely.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1/2 lemon, juiced, or more to taste
1/4 teaspoon chopped fresh mint, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme, or to taste
